summary: The package implements a collection of benchmark utilities for assessing the classification accuracy of various graph neural network architectures—including attention‑based, convolutional, relational, and inductive models—using DGL and PyTorch. Each file defines a specific GNN model, its training/evaluation loop, and helper routines for computing and recording accuracy on node or graph prediction tasks.
business_intent: To provide a standardized framework for measuring and comparing the predictive performance of different GNN models on graph‑structured datasets, enabling researchers and engineers to evaluate model suitability and guide selection for downstream applications.
